title: i bought an OEM pixel wall charger from google on amazon and it stop working after a few weeks!
content:
i bought an OEM pixel wall charger from google on amazon and it stop working after a few weeks 
it appears that the listing is not 100% legit as a lot of people had the same problem in the comment section below the listing.
PS: i cant return the product because i bought it threw a friend.
this the link of the listing https://amzn.to/2Gr8nm5
